message: it's a great radio plays exactly what your ears need to hear. I've been listening it for months and pretty happy to discover new music, while I'm working instead of registering and getting used to crappy, commercial services
+1 RP has been a longtime standby and source of discovery
Too, white, middle class and old for me. And I speak as a white, middle class 54 year old.
I hear ya there. I tend to listen to KCRW's Eclectic 24 (or any of their music programs for that matter) whenever I want a dose of random variety these days: http://www.kcrw.com/music/eclectic24
I love RP, but agree that the selection can be a little dated at times. I've moved a chunk of my listening to Error FM - http://www.errorfm.com/ - can be found in the iTunes radio directory.
I find RP is perfect for work. I can just listen and don't have to think about selection. Plus, I've found a lot of new (as in "to me", not as in current) music that I've subsequently obtained.
